import React from 'react'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog'; import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions'; import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent'; import DialogTitle from '@material-ui/core/DialogTitle'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; export default function VitalForm() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false); const [vitals, setVitals] = React.useState({ systolic: '', mood: '' }); const handleClickOpen = () => { setOpen(true); }; const handleClose = () => { setOpen(false); console.log({ vitals }); }; const inputChangeHandler = (event) => { setVitals({ ...vitals, [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; return (
Add New Vitals Blood Pressure SPO2 Pulse Ox Heart rate Respiratory Rate Temprature Mood
); }
